Meal Drive-Up distribution is Monday-Friday from 11:30 AM - 12:30 PM.

If you have any questions about eligibility, please contact brunnerj@pearlriver.org

Supt. Letter Re: Extended School Closures & June Regents Exams

img.alt: Pearl River School District Home Page
img.div: Every Child Can and Will Learn

div.p: Keeping students safe, even while we exist in virtual classrooms and schools, remains a top priority for all of us. As part of the Pearl River School District Acceptable Use policy, all Chromebooks and all other district owned devices, and email/Google accounts are the property of the Pearl River School District and as such, may be monitored and inspected at any time. Students should have no expectation of privacy of materials found on the Chromebook, Google drive, email accounts and/or network files. Our relay filter continues to monitor all district owned devices, even while we are in a remote learning setting. This filter ensures the safety and well-being of all of our students by monitoring for a variety of sites and searches, including but not limited to, inappropriate materials, unsafe websites or applications, and safety checks for anything that could be considered self-harm searches or activities. School personnel will be notified and will follow up on any of these warnings when they are received.

Please continue to talk to your children about online safety and a positive digital footprint. If you are interested in a resource to assist with online behaviors, please fill out this form (https://tinyurl.com/PRsmartsocial) to receive a login for SmartSocial parent learning modules.
If you have any questions regarding how our safety filters work, please reach out to our Director of Technology, Jamie Haug, at Haugj@pearlriver.org
We wish all of our Pearl River School District families well.

a.span: 3-24-20 Childcare for First Responders and Healthcare Workers

div.p:
The Pearl River School District will distribute FREE bagged meals to all students eligible for Free and Reduced Lunch while school is closed. This includes a hot bagged lunch and a cold bagged breakfast (for the next morning) beginning Thursday, March 19, 2020.
Governor Cuomo has extended the closing of all schools until May 15th; please see the meal distribution schedule and menu for March 30th - April 8th below:

p.strong:
at Pearl River High School Pirate Cove entrance.
Menu for April 13th - April 24th, 2020

strong.span: UPDATE: Effective Monday, April 27th food distribution will be at Franklin Ave School.

div.p: If you have any questions about eligibility, please contact brunnerj@pearlriver.org .
